title: The automorphism groups of Kummer surfaces in characteristic two
abstract:
We shall calculate the automorphism group of the Kummer surfaces associated
with a curve of genus 2 or the product of two elliptic curves in characteristic
two under the assumption that the Kummer surface is a K3 surface. Moreover we
discuss the corresponding complex case and a generalized Kummer surface in
characteristic three. The paper has an appendix by the second author.
